CustomField.formula: IF ( IsReplaced__c = TRUE, 'Replaced', IF ( IsVoid__c = TRUE, 'Void', IF ( AND( Contract_Start_Date__c <= TODAY(), Contract_End_Date__c >= TODAY() ), 'Active', IF ( Contract_Start_Date__c > TODAY(), 'Upcoming', IF ( Contract_End_Date__c < TODAY(), 'Past', 'Invalid' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Contract Status
